career_path.summary: Graduates of this course have abundant career opportunities within healthcare systems, working in government or private hospitals, and universities. Further academic pursuits are also available, including various Master of Science degrees in fields like Medical Laboratory Technology, Medical Microbiology, Medical Biochemistry, and Forensic Science, as well as postgraduate diplomas in Biomedical Lab Technology, Lab Services, and Medical Lab Technology.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
Owing to the extreme requirements of these professionals in a healthcare system, the career opportunities are in abundance. They can work in either of them:
• Govt or Private Hospitals,
• Universities,
After completing this course, they can also pursue further studies such as-
• M.Sc in Medical Laboratory Technology,
• M.Sc in Medical Microbiology,
• M.Sc in Medical Biochemistry,
• M.Sc in Forensic science,
• PGD (Post graduate Diploma) in Biomedical Lab Technology.
• PGD in Lab Services,
• PGD in Medical Lab Technology
Take the next step towards a career in allied health sciences.
